name: One Bullet At A Time (ovoronin)
description:
If you only had one shot to me the world a better place, which pressing issues would address as your first priority? Protoss players cannon rushing you again? Or maybe people with a horrible taste in music blasting their tunes in public?

Lo and behold as you don't have to choose no more, just call our professional hitman services to solve this issue for you! We'll only use one bullet but we'll make it count!
